entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Orillia
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:45 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Simcoe Regional Airport 1:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: -5.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -6.6°C
Wind: WSW 26 km/h gust 47 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Blizzard. High plus 1 with temperature falling to minus 6 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow. Blizzard developing this afternoon. Blowing snow this afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h becoming southwest 50 gusting to 70 this afternoon. High plus 1 with temperature falling to minus 6 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 16 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:09 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Local snowfall amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 90. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 11:09 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
